INJURY NEWS
Sunday, 7/30/2025
Sunday 3/5/2025 :
Bill Freeman was injured while pitching.
Diagnosis: Ruptured Bicep Tendon.
He is out for about 5 weeks.
Paul Bath was injured while making a catch.
Diagnosis: Fractured Ulna.
He will be OK in about 4-5 weeks.

Bill Beiler was injured while pitching.
Diagnosis: Strained Back.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.
